definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: That’s very kind of you but I’m afraid I have a prior engagement.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝您的好意，不過我已經有約在先了。

sentences.english: Sorry, I'm engaged for this tango .
sentences.chinese: 對不起，這曲探戈我已有約在先了。

sentences.english: I fear that a prior engagement will prohibit me from joining you in dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我有約在先，恐怕不能與你共進晚餐。

sentences.english: I am unable to attend because of a previous engagement.
sentences.chinese: 我因有約在先故不能出席。

sentences.english: I'd love to, but I have a prior engagement.
sentences.chinese: 我非常想去，但是我和別人有約在先。

sentences.english: I cannot see you on Monday because I have a previous engagement.
sentences.chinese: 星期一我不能和你見面，因爲我有約在先了。

sentences.english: Sorry, I am engaged for the social dance.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，這交際舞我有約在先了。

sentences.english: I fear that a prior engagement will prohibit me from joining you at dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我有約在先，恐怕不能與你共進晚餐。

sentences.english: I was unable to attend the meeting because of a prior engagement.
sentences.chinese: 我因有約在先，所以未能參加這個會。

sentences.english: Sorry, I'm engaged for the social dance.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，這曲交誼舞我已經有約在先了。

sentences.english: I was unable to attend because of a engagement.
sentences.chinese: 我因有約在先，無法出席。

sentences.english: I was unable to attend the party because of a prior appointment.
sentences.chinese: 由於和別人有約在先，我不能參加晚會。
